scopes.https://mail.google.com/: Read, send, delete, and manage your email
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.me: View your email message metadata such as labels and headers, but not the email body
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.mo: View and modify but not delete your email
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.re: View your email messages and settings
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/gmail.se: Manage your sensitive mail settings, including who can manage your mail

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive: View and manage the files in your Google Drive
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.fi: View and manage Google Drive files and folders that you have opened or created with this app
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.re: View the files in your Google Drive
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsh: View and manage your spreadsheets in Google Drive

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/analytic: View and manage your Google Analytics data
Manage Google Analytics Account users by email address
Create a new Google Analytics account along with its default property and view
Manage Google Analytics user deletion requests
